full_summary:
#### National Adult Immunization Coverage Survey 2023
### Request for Proposal
#### Solicitation Number: WS3851666143
______________________
* **Publication Date:** March 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 4, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. EDT
* **Amendment Date:** March 29, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 10, 2023

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) seeks proposals from contractors to conduct a national adult immunization coverage survey in all ten Canadian provinces and three territories. The survey will assess the prevalence of immunization coverage among adults aged 18 years and older and among healthcare workers in Canada.

### Request for Tender Submission

Proposals must be submitted electronically on the Ariba Discovery platform or through the CanadaBuys portal. The closing time for proposal submissions is April 4, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. EDT. All proposals submitted after this time will be considered non-responses.

The successful contractor will be responsible for providing services to the Vaccine Coverage and Effectiveness Monitoring (VCEM) Division at PHAC. The scope of work includes conducting a national survey in all Canadian provinces and territories, analyzing data, and providing a report on the findings.

### Procurement Details

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Category:** Services
* **UNSPC Code:** 81112000 - Data Services
* **Service Description:** Data services
* **Region of Opportunity:** None
* **Region of Delivery:** Ottawa
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Important Notes

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by April 4, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. EDT.

### Contact Information

For more information about this procurement, please contact Ayi, Bernice (SPAC/PSPC) at [bernice.ayi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:bernice.ayi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). _______________________

#### Reference Number: WS3851666143-Doc3853772916

#### Amendment Number: 6
